revised_title: Inquiries into the Constitution of Salts: Oxalates, Nitrates, Phosphates, Sulphates, and Chlorides
tldr: The author investigates the constitution of various salts, including oxalates, nitrates, phosphates, sulphates, and chlorides, and their hydration states. The study focuses on the properties and composition of these salts, providing insights into their chemical structures and reactions.
